thread.section_title: Fertel Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Weekend in Paris - Review of Fertel Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: owramman
title: Weekend in Paris
text: The Hotel is very well placed just off Champs Elysees on a quiet street. The room are small but very clean and bathrooms have been refurbished. The reception staff were very helpful with directions and advice. Breakfast is usual continental and only on Monday when we came down a little later was there issues of not having certain things available. Overall my wife and daughters enjoyed the hospitality of the hotel.
